column1: The Russians are making heavy sacrifices for the war
column2: but in these historic days we must speed up our energies still more
column3: we must double and treble our sacrifices. Let us not forget that despite all our sacrifices
column4: despite all our sorrow and alarm we are not deprived of peaceful work
column5: we have not been drawn into destruction as the people of Poland have been. Without further delay we have to hasten to their aid.A widely organized social aid must be brought to the fleeing people. We must provide them with shelter and food. These victims are flocking to the central provinces of Russia
column7: and they must be assisted up to the time when they shall be able to return to their country. It is necessary to ascertain the degree of their distress and to help to provide them with the necessities of life in places already cleared from the enemy by the aggressiveness of the Russian Army.
